alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 11:09AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong shower with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Hart, southeastern Grayson, southwestern Hardin and north central Edmonson Counties through 1145 AM EST/1045 AM CST/... At 1108 AM EST/1008 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower with gusty winds 7 miles south of Leitchfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This shower with gusty winds will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Hart, southeastern Grayson, north central Edmonson and southern Hardin Counties, including the following locations... Rock Creek, Lines Mill, Broadway, Broad Ford, Peonia, Sadler, Pearman, Snap, Wax and Royal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
